snippet.title: Ninja Outbreak Trailer 3
snippet.description:
Ninja Outbreak is a survival horror game where you play as a lone scientist in an off-world research station which has been overrun by Ninjas.

Support the game by voting for it on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=355603149

Coming September 20th
